mean_en: in a way that involves hesitating before doing something because you do not want to do it or because you are not sure that it is the right thing to do.
word_etyma: re相反+luct努力+ant...的+ly→reluctantly不情愿地；勉强地
sentence: My "meat-eating" son looked reluctantly at the food I handed to him.
sentence_trans: 我“只吃肉的”儿子不情愿地看着我递给他的食物。
